column3: str
M-My <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>lord</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Have you come to inspect the reconstruction? In any case, we're honored for your visit!

Ah, my <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>lord</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! The chief foreman mentioned that you'd be helping us. It'd be my pleasure to explain the work to you!
First and foremost, in order to carry out the reconstruction, it goes without saying that we require a great deal of supplies.
To that end, we ask that our artisans provide us with various supplies.
Items you wish to donate can be brought to myself. Feel free to ask me any time about what we seek.
Naturally, you'll be rewarded for your contributions. Depending on the item, we'll present you with an amount in skybuilders' scrips.
You can take these scrips to Enie yonder, who will exchange them for various wares. If you wish to know more, she would be glad to assist you.
Now, has anyone informed you about our unique materials requirements? If not, please allow me.
While most of the materials our artisans require are commonplace, some are completely specific to our needs.
For such items, we must turn to gatherers for procurement. If you're versed in this field, we would appreciate your assistance!

Information on the items required may be viewed under <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Ishgardian Restoration<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> in the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>gathering log<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Oh, er... It seems you're still relatively inexperienced in your craft.
While it pains me to say this, we require all of our artisans to possess a certain level of skill.
I'm afraid there isn't anything we can ask you to bring at this time...
You must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 20 or above in order to deliver items to Potkin.
Hmmm... Yes, I see that you're amply experienced in your craft.
If you'd kindly lend me your log, I'll write down a list of the items we need for your reference.
Of course, our needs can change over time. If you wish to know what's currently in demand, don't hesitate to ask me.

Items requested by Potkin can be crafted by accessing the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>crafting log<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and selecting the recipe under <Emphasis>Ishgardian Restoration</Emphasis>.

<If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>Good evening<Else/>Good morning</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>Good day<Else/>Good evening</If></If>, my <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>lord</If>! How may I assist you?

Concerted works are underway even as we speak, my <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lady<Else/>lord</If>. While your participation would be appreciated, if you have items to contribute, I'd of course be happy to take them off your hands.
Thanks to the efforts of our artisans, all scheduled works have been completed. In preparation for the next stage, I hope we can continue to depend on contributions from you!
